ch.nolix.core.sequencer

Class Sequencer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.sequencer.Sequencer

  • public final class Sequencer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to control program flows. Of this class no instance can be created.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
